alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke, east central Faulkner and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olmstead, or near Little Rock AFB. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cabot... Otto... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
